You and your sibling arrived here from another world. Separated by an unknown god, stripped of your powers, and cast into a deep slumber, you now awake to a world very different from when you first arrived.

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Climb any mountain, swim across any river, and glide over the world below, taking in the jaw-dropping scenery each step of the way. And if you stop to investigate a wandering Seelie or strange mechanism, who knows what you might discover?

ELEMENTAL COMBAT SYSTEM

Harness the seven elements to unleash elemental reactions. Anemo, Electro, Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, Dendro, and Geo interact in all sorts of ways, and Vision wielders have the power to turn this to their advantage.

Will you vaporize Hydro with Pyro, electro-charge it with Electro, or freeze it with Cryo? Your mastery of the elements will give you the upper hand in battle and exploration.

BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

我們輸了。
「萊徹」無預警地來襲，殘忍地鎮壓地上的人類。
其原因不明，無法談判。
就如同天敵一般，瞬間將陸地變為火海。
面對它們那海嘯般接連不斷的攻勢，至今為止積累的科技成果都沒有了任何意義。
人類只是，被蹂躪的一方。
開發中的人形兵器是我們的最後希望，然而成效卻是微乎其微，逆轉戰局的奇蹟並沒有發生。
真正的完敗。
地面被萊徹奪走，人類被迫往地下深處遷移。


在那之後過了幾十年，在人類的新住所「方舟」裡，少女們醒了過來。
被驅逐到地下的人類集合了所有技術結晶「對萊徹用決戰人形兵器」。
少女們搭乘了幾十年從沒開啟過，去往地上的電梯。
人類只能祈禱。
少女們會成為我們的箭矢。
成為我們的復仇之劍。
少女們帶著這祈願賦予之名，前往地面。
為人類帶來勝利最後的希望。
名為——妮姬。

活用戰術，體驗瞬息萬變的戰場！

◆ STORY: 
A tale of “justice” woven by girls whose fragile hearts verge on shattering... 

There are girls who many call “witches.” 
Although they themselves are ordinary, they can wield slightly extraordinary powers. 
However, when calamity spreads throughout the land, witches begin to be feared and detested. 
Before long, the Church of Longinus commenced what would be known as “The Witch Hunt.” 

“Witches are to blame for this calamity. If we kill them, then the calamity will vanish along with them!” 

Witches are executed one by one. 
But one day, as madness seizes control of the world, it is suddenly overrun by “Curses.” 
A country incinerated by hellfire. A kingdom consumed by crystals. An empire purged by the Tree of Life. 
Such are the woeful desires of those who are called “Witches of Qlipha.” 
Without any means to defend themselves, nation after nation falls into ruin, until finally— 
The fractured land is sent adrift high into the sky. 

Meanwhile, the people have yet to take notice. 
From within these girls cursed to be witches, there emanates glimmers of hope. 
In order to save their decimated world, these girls set forth liberating the land from darkness.

哐當！看我挖到了什麼？世界地圖裡竟然有寶藏，一起來尋寶呀。

【動物養成，圖鑒收集】
城市建設需要招募更多動物，動物專屬特長為工廠生產、拓荒、建築搭建、釣魚等活動線上自己的一份力。但是想讓他們工作的話，必須要住上動物公寓哦。
長頸鹿喜歡和伴侶看日落，所以他在家裡開了兩個天窗探頭欣賞。
企鵝家裡不買電視和冰箱，因為她就是電視，她伴侶就是冰箱。
樹懶是著名的路癡，總找不到回家的路……
獨具個性的動物們在城市裡穿梭遊走，歡迎來撩！

【經營系統，放置玩法】
工廠樹會長出很多美食！有香甜美味的南瓜派、醇香濃郁的咖啡、柔軟酸甜的草莓聖代……把這些食物拿去訂單交易，能獲得大量的金幣和建築材料哦。
另外，眾多訂單裡面有一份特殊的訂單，是熊貓墩墩周遊世界的時候順便帶去交易的。有空可以翻看墩墩的旅行日記，特別有意思。     遊戲的養成系統簡單易上手，升級和解鎖都由玩家自己選擇，等級樹只要放置動物居民研究即可完成升級解鎖。如果想經營好城市，那做好時間管理，合理安排好動物工作！


【共同建設，家園合併】
遊戲設定中有共同建設的玩法。
玩家能委託好友裝飾自己的城市，解鎖家族後能邀請家族成員合併家園島，自由建設共同展現家族的魅力。家族中每個族員都可以通過挖礦、跑商、釣魚、遠征獲得家族貢獻獲得豐富的裝飾資源。


【個性裝飾，自由度高】
玩家角色形象、城市、家園庭院和室內，你都可以進行diy。無論是一條馬路、一張椅子、乃至一棵草，都需要你來搭建。遊戲內室內外裝飾主題應有盡有，室外的瑰麗海洋、夏日海灘、浪漫婚禮……室內的森林風、少女風等等，一鍵解決不會裝飾的煩惱！

最後，跟隨你內心的靈感，按照你的想法，大膽建造屬於你的城市吧！

Experience the best of humanity in a place where you can meaningfully connect with others. In Sky, you can soar above the clouds, play instruments, or just relax and enjoy the beauty around you. There is no pressure. Just allow the experience to open up at your own pace. All are welcome, especially you!

The Story:
From the creators behind Journey and Flower, comes a peaceful social adventure that is set to warm your hearts - Sky: Children of the Light.

With the stars united, our light was infinite. But darkness came and the stars fell, creating a new home in the clouds. A long time has passed...it is time to bring our lost stars home. Wake up Child of the Light, your adventure begins now.

Experience the enchanting world of Sky, a beautifully-animated kingdom waiting to be explored by you and your loved ones. Spirits and their stories will lead you through their peaceful world and all its 7 realms. Help the star spirits return home - you will need compassion for humanity, timeless wonder, and light within your heart to guide your way.

Meet players in this peaceful, open world MMORPG and team up to uncover the secrets of Sky. Play together and encounter the great wonders that Sky has worldwide. Team up with others to adventure into darker realms, save spirits and uncover ancient treasures. Bring light and positive warmth to everything you touch. Join others from around the world on an adventure that never ends - Sky is an ever-expanding open world with expanding realms and seasonal events.

In Sky, we arrive as the Children of the Light, spreading hope and light through the desolate kingdom to return fallen Stars to their homes in the constellations.

SKY FEATURES

Social Adventure Game:
- Journey through 7 dreamlike realms and uncover the mystery of the stars
- Positive and relaxing MMORPG of timeless wonder
- Explore the world to save spirits in each constellation and set them free
- Epic story adventure of bringing lost stars home
- Meet new characters and unlock unique stories with each new adventure, season and event

Play Together & Create Genuine Human Connections:
- Play with friends to save spirits of the Sky realm
- Adventure with your friends, or meet new friends online from all over the world
- Team up with others to adventure into darker realms, and uncover ancient treasures
- Create new bonds and encounter other friendly players online with charming expressions
- Gift candles of light to share appreciation and grow friendships in every realm

Friendly Open World:
- Join an ever-expanding world with new upcoming attractions, seasonal events and expansions of realms
- This MMORPG is an uplifting social adventure that is set to warm your heart
- Explore the open world solo or with friends to experience the beauty of Sky

Unlock & Level Up the Children of Light:
- Unlock items, like Winged Light, to help you explore the world of Sky
- Level up and express yourself through your character with unique customizations
- Express yourself and customize your hair, clothing color schemes and more

You are filled with a peaceful light young one, share your compassion with humanity.

Sheep N Sheep is one of the newest tile matching games. Most tile games are suitable for casual entertaining, but also help to relax after stressful studying and working hours. The rules are simple and easy to pick up. All you need is to match 3 tiles with the same vivid picture, for instance, 3 bells or 3 grass. Clear the board from all the tiles to go to the next level.

Matching games can be tricky, but normally they have some common tile connect mechanics. After all, you still need to connect the tiles with pictures, right? Most free tile games have quite similar rules. And here’s ours.

HOW TO PLAY OUR TILES GAME
Well, you should match 3 tiles with the same image. Just tap to put them into the stack. Three same tiles will be matched and removed from the stack.
When you clear the board, you win. Keep practicing to become a real tile master one day.
You fail, if you don't get at least one merge for seven tiles in your stack. Remember: you have a maximum of seven moves to make one combination of three tiles. Each tile link move matters.

Sheep N Sheep FEATURES
► Match Tiles - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. Puzzles start with low difficulty and become challenging fast!
► Super difficult puzzle - only 0.1% of players can solve the puzzle. Are you one of them? Come and challenge yourself!
► One new stage a day - a brand new stage will be published every day, challenge with global users, and compete with the speed of clearance!
► Compete with global users - the leaderboard will display the number of players who pass the level in each region, try to pass the level to occupy the top of the leaderboard!
► Create a Calm Experience - Solve addictive yet always evolving tile matching mahjong puzzles in a unique and calm experience.
► Relax and Have Fun - Take your time to solve the puzzles and clear the board. They are simply for your entertainment and will relax your brain.

Enjoy this tile-matching mahjong game, have a moment of peace throughout your day to calm your mind and boost your brain. Sharpen your mind with a series of tile matching levels that gradually increase puzzle difficulty.

Come back to it every day, as there is always a new daily tile matching mahjong puzzle!

Increase mindfulness, exercise your brain, and take control of your daily life through puzzle games. Start matching sheep tiles!

首款田園系武俠經營遊戲《江湖悠悠》
來最放鬆的江湖世界，體驗最悠悠的退隱生活!


山重水複疑無路，柳暗花明又一村!
在兵戈擾攘、百家爭鬥的武林江湖中，這裡有處恍若五柳先生筆下的世外桃源
你無需煩憂紅塵瑣事，不必角逐世俗功利
收劍入鞘、解甲歸田，此處是你歸途的終點
沏壺酒、煮碗粥，收拾紛亂疲憊的心，將生活點滴譜寫成日記，只需放鬆自己，享受這不一樣的江湖



《江湖悠悠》打破以往所有武俠遊戲的玩法，
全新首款田園系武俠，種下幸福的種子，準備美味的菜肴，與你的少俠一起到江湖世界各地旅行，
上百種江湖風景，上千種旅行事件，精彩豐富的江湖秘聞，在最放鬆的家園，享受你的悠閒時光! 


【遊戲特色】


【帶上行囊，與少俠一起出發旅行】

跟著性格獨特的少俠，一同遊歷廣袤的江湖世界－
不同於傳統武俠，你無法全然控制少俠的生活；你的少俠或許會在子夜飛簷走壁、御劍擊破宵小的突襲、會在雪中獨釣江雪、拎起行囊遠赴絕景、傷痕累累歷劫歸來；他會為發現菜譜感到開心、會為盜匪欺民感到憤怒、會為故人離去感到哀傷……你會從旁伴隨少俠的成長，一起經歷旅途中的喜怒哀樂。



【超唯美武俠，3D 還原世外桃源之景】
人人都有理想中的桃花源！季節場景真實還原－成隊小鴨遊過春暖江水、點點螢光閃爍盛夏林間；成熟果實結滿入秋枝頭；皚皚白雪砌滿寒冬水面。隨著四季更迭，你還能為少俠悠悠換上各種時節的服裝，在家園掛上一盞花燈、種下一顆櫻樹、以梅花妝點外牆、用墨竹打造床鋪……帶回各地建材製作裝飾，盡情發揮創意，打造屬於自己的世外桃源吧！



【療癒系武俠，愛恨情仇皆為紅塵】
相逢何必曾相識？有緣千里來相聚！有別於傳統武俠的暴戾之氣，在這裡你能通過與市井小民對話、收到村民來信、出遊偶遇等多種敘事方式，閱覽深藏在這片田園江湖的人物故事，加深與人們的情感連結。且不僅於此！你還能寫下自己的江湖見聞公開分享，甚至能續寫他人未完成的故事！在這裡你能細細品嘗愜意生活，打造一個治癒心靈、有人情溫度的江湖！



【煙火人間，結交好友一起享受】

這裡沒有傳統武俠的幫會，只有自然聚集而成的村落。村民之間彼此扶持，共禦外患。不求武林第一、不爭排名貢獻，大夥僅是圍起籬笆種田養魚、拿起刀劍抵禦盜匪入侵，並在煙花齊放的廣場共用盛宴；除此之外，亦能備酒備菜招待造訪家園的好友，到對方家中贈花祈福。在這裡你能放慢腳步，等一封遠方來信，等一盞流水河燈，體驗不一樣的「慢社交」生活。



【倚劍天涯，闖蕩武林江湖】
執一劍深藏功與名！遊戲共有六大門派，風格與招式任你體驗，上千種技能任你挑選，在這裡你也可以是一位退隱的絕世高手，戰鬥在過招時仍然刀劍凌厲，翻轉騰挪招架格擋，劍光火石間捕捉破綻，終結技一擊定勝負! 

【田園武俠生活，探索上百種美食】

在獨一無二的家園內，你能耕種小麥、稻穀等作物，並自由組合食材研發新菜色。這些美食貫穿廣袤河山及中華歷史，超過百種配方等你探索！還有釀酒、煉藥、種果樹、養雞與寵物培養等經營玩法豐富你的田園生活！現在就乘上輕舟，駛向屬於你的桃花源！

《一念逍遙》是一款水墨畫風修仙放置遊戲，讓你隨時隨地踏入仙途，輕鬆體驗修仙日常。
在這裡你將扮演一位尋仙問道的人魔後裔，一方面通過努力修煉，擺脫肉體桎梏，渡劫逆襲成仙；一方面禦劍尋山訪水，結交天下道友，揭開身世之謎。

【遊戲特色】

——水墨丹青，尋仙問道，漫漫仙途風光無限
《一念逍遙》基於傳統的寫意水墨流派，參考封神榜以及山海經等古代神話，構建出一個水墨丹青的仙俠世界，讓你感受仙道文化的飄逸灑脫。

——逍遙掛機，輕鬆修仙，一朝得道飛升仙界
與傳統放置類遊戲不同。
《一念逍遙》獨創真實掛機玩法，即使你離線，伺服器也會模擬真實線上產出對應收益。同時可以和其他線上玩家產生即時交互。

——千人同圖，尋寶屠魔，論道切磋共踏仙路
《一念逍遙》採用自研動態程式設計語言進行伺服器開發，支援千人同屏的宗門戰、組隊屠魔、異界入侵等社交玩法，擺脫「掛機=單機」的局面。

——仙友萬千，宗門林立，長生之路吾道不孤
《一念逍遙》中有豐富的宗門玩法，加入並建設宗門，不但能結交眾多仙友，更能獲取資源極大提升自己的戰力。更有宗門亂鬥、宗門對決等即時PVP對抗玩法等你來挑戰！

——自由修煉，遍地機緣，神通無窮術法無邊
《一念逍遙》有獨特的「體法雙修」玩法。開局可自選修煉方向，崇尚極致武道選煉體，追求天地五行則選修法。習神通集古寶，禦靈獸種靈植，仙丹靈器自己煉。一日築基成功，三日突破元嬰！

祝各位仙友一念成仙，自在逍遙！

▣ 遊戲介紹 ▣

天下風雲出我輩，一入江湖歲月催。

皇圖霸業談笑中，不勝人生一場醉。

都說武俠是成年人的童話，可是兒時的大俠夢，你們，還記得嗎？

《武林英雄傳》是一款放置類武俠遊戲，日常僅需「10分鐘」，「無定點活動」超佛系，能夠真正的了解並滿足諸多武俠迷的訴求。

遊戲內有多達「十四個門派」可供選擇，更有「上千本神功密卷」等你來拿！

自古正邪不兩立，行俠成魔一念間！

在這片純粹的武俠凈土裡，路見不平，你可以拔刀相助；一言不合，也可以揮劍相向。
休戚一體的幫派兄弟會在萬眾矚目的戰場上演繹一場巔峰之戰，知根知底的同門也可能為了一個寶藏而大打出手......
絕世武功、神兵利器、知己紅顏......你想要的，這裡都有！


▣ 特色玩法介紹▣

【 十四門派】：逐鹿爭鋒，江湖豪俠群龍無首，亟待英豪出世一統江湖。江湖代有高人出，各領風騷數百年。想要與諸多同門一起振興師門嗎？武當、少林、丐幫、峨眉、華山、全真、古墓、血刀、明教、銅人、大理、逍遙...精研門派武學，帶給你最純粹的江湖體驗！

【上千武學】： 桃花影落飛神劍，碧海潮生弄玉簫。在這裡，共有1000多種武俠迷耳熟能詳的經典武學可供選擇。初入江湖的小蝦米可集眾家之長於一身，通過戰鬥與歷練不斷地磨礪自己的武學，最終成為名動江湖的一代大俠。

【決戰巔峰】：十載寒窗無人問，一舉成名天下知。江湖上不僅有生死與共的朋友，更有許多肝膽相照的對手。只需要將自己的戰力提升到門派前二，即可代表師門出戰，與各派高手決戰巔峰！作為武林中的一顆新星，你準備好接受歡呼了嗎？

【 歸藏風雲】：沙場烽火連胡月，海畔雲山擁薊城。大宋積弱，四方夷狄蠢蠢欲動。值此危難之際，身懷絕世武學的你，又會做出怎樣的選擇？

【比武擂台】：自古文無第一，武無第二。這個江湖中，誰才是真正的強者？我們擂台見！

【江湖歷練】：閱盡紅塵惹一笑,從此別去自逍遙。受夠了在乏味的掛機中無休止的等待？豐富的劇情事件、貼心的快速歷練，讓你不再為每日的瑣事掛心！江湖，就是要快意恩仇！

【絕境秘地】：匹夫無罪，懷璧其罪。尋寶的路上不知有多少宵小在暗中窺伺。憑你幾路來，我只一路去。雖萬千人，吾往矣！

【陣法大師】：運籌帷幄之中，決勝千裏之外。文武雙全的你，快快靈活運用各類陣法，在一次次戰鬥中脫穎而出吧！

▣ 官方粉絲團▣

Sausage Man is a cartoon-styled, competitive shooting, battle royale game featuring sausages as protagonists. It is a game that you can get started with effortlessly and play anytime, anywhere. You will roleplay as funny and adorable sausages and fight in high-octane, imagination-filled battles. 

[Exhilarating Combat with Tactical Firepower]
Sausage Man features a fast-paced and detailed combat system, including realistic bullet physics. Scavenge for powerful firearms and tactical gear, including flare guns, revival tools, tactical shields, and ID card systems to test the strength of you and your friends’ teamwork.

[Mess Around in a Vibrant, Open World]
There’s more to the combat zone than just intense fighting! Screw around in a vibrant game world where you can sing, jump and get into all kinds of hilarious fun with your friends. Put on a life buoy and blast your enemies as you float on the water! Annoy snipers by double jumping with gleeful abandon! Let your imagination run wild and have a ball of a time.

[Be All the Sausage You Can Be]
Express yourself as the coolest Sausage in the room! Customize your appearance with a ridiculous array of costumes that span a variety of themes, such as Koi, Cyberpunk, and French Maid, and emote with cute emoticons and animations. Build your reputation among your fellow Sausages with the unique Party Card system, which keeps track of your appearances, achievements and combat data!

It’s the last minute of the game and your opponent has the ball… but he’s lost it! What a chance to score the winner… you take aim, shoot… GOOOOOOAAAAAALLLLL!

With simple gameplay and great physics, Soccer Stars is easy to pick up and fun to play! In true competitive style, challenge your opponents all over the world for online table soccer matches!

Compete in different tiers, from different countries! Play online against people from all over the world or against your friends! Login with your Facebook account and challenge your friends to show them what it means to be a Soccer Legend and take the cup home! Oh, and you can also play offline against a friend in the same device!
 
You can also customize your Soccer Stars experience by collecting the different teams! Show off your style and defend your nation’s colors!

What are you waiting for? Everyone else is already playing Soccer Stars! Don’t miss out on this chance to have tons of fun! 

KEY FEATURES:

- Online and offline multiplayer game
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Amazing ball physics
- Online tournaments against players from all over the world
- Play against your friends
- Collect different teams and cups

VIP Subscriptions

Woodoku: wood block puzzle games meet a sudoku grid. It’s a calm but challenging puzzle that you’ll be addicted to in no time!

Place blocks in the 9x9 board and fill rows, columns or squares to clear them from the game. Play for as long as you can without running out of space to beat your high score!

How to Play:

□ Drag shapes onto the board to place them in the grid.
□ Fill a row, column, or square to clear blocks from the board.
□ Clear multiple rows, regions, or squares to earn Combo points!
□ Clear blocks on every turn to earn Streak points!
□ Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!
□ Have yourself a woody good time!
It’s a quiet, zen game that’s easy to learn, but challenging to master! Take your time and take it easy.

Featuring:

□ Beautiful graphics and satisfying sound effects
□ A tactile game experience with realistic wood tile design
□ Relaxing gameplay with no pressure or time limit
□ A light, small game that won’t take space on your device
□ Playable offline so you can enjoy this classic anywhere
